sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action retrieves document attachments for a candidate by ID.

Inputs:

  • Candidate ID -ID of the candidate for whom to retrieve attachment.

Outputs:

  • Documents - Document Details.
    • File Name - Name of the file attached.
    • File Size - Size of file in bytes.
    • Uploaded At - Date and time of the file uploaded.
    • Document Type - Type of document 'Resume' or 'Authorization'.
    • Document Type ID - ID of the type of document for Resume it is 144.
    • Document ID - ID of the document attached.
    • File Content Type - Content type of the file for e.g. application/pdf.
  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Provided Candidate ID is invalid or not found.
  • Invalid username or password/token or the token has expired.
  • The user does not have sufficient permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding First Advantage connection and credential must be created and associated with the First Advantage Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
This action retrieves document attachments for a candidate by ID.

Inputs:

  • Candidate ID -ID of the candidate for whom to retrieve attachment.

Outputs:

  • Documents - Document Details.
    • File Name - Name of the file attached.
    • File Size - Size of file in bytes.
    • Uploaded At - Date and time of the file uploaded.
    • Document Type - Type of document 'Resume' or 'Authorization'.
    • Document Type ID - ID of the type of document for Resume it is 144.
    • Document ID - ID of the document attached.
    • File Content Type - Content type of the file for e.g. application/pdf.
  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Provided Candidate ID is invalid or not found.
  • Invalid username or password/token or the token has expired.
  • The user does not have sufficient permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding First Advantage connection and credential must be created and associated with the First Advantage Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
